1.19.1.1: Added Pomegranate foods. Renamed Lemon to Lime. Bug fixes.
1.19.1.1.1: Wandering Trader sells Lime Seeds. JEI descriptions. Fixes.
1.19.1.1.2: Veggie Wrap craftable from CD Tortilla. Fixes.
1.19.1.2: Added Corrosion and Volatility effects from Lime and Pomegranate foods respectively. Added Neapolitan compat.
1.19.1.2.1: Added Gummies. New foods for Neapolitan and Farmer's Respite. Fixes.

1.20.1.1.3: Added Chieftain Crab, Platinum Bass, Tide Clam, Tiger Prawn, Urchin and related foods. Added support for My Nether's Delight.
1.20.1.1.3.1: Fixed Lime, Pomegranate, and Portobello spawns. Added Gummies for Seasonals. Decreased mob spawns to prevent bloating spawn cap.
1.20.1.1.3.2: Update bush textures and growth mechanics. Removed colonies from Portobello patch spawns. Add Jade support to bushes.
1.20.1.1.3.3: Added Stygian Pomegranate, Urchin Dart, Shimmering Apple, and Shimmering Pearl, Pearly Claw, and Pearl armor trim material. Recipe/tag/mob spawn fixes.
1.20.1.1.3.4: Added Coaster models (for Brewin' and Chewin') and support for Botany Pots. Slightly reduced some mob spawns.
